author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Powell Industries Says CFO Don Madison Plans To Retire At End Of Fiscal Year
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Powell Industries Inc:
* POWELL INDUSTRIES ANNOUNCES CFO RETIREMENT PLAN * POWELL INDUSTRIES INC - DON R. MADISON, EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT AND CHIEF FINANCIAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER, PLANS TO RETIRE AT END OF FISCAL YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
